Sentencas: Chemical compatibility in oxidizing and reducing environments between sealants and interconnects for planar solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) are investigated.
Titulo: Chemical compatibility of Al2O3-added glass sealant with bare and coated interconnect in oxidizing and reducing environments

Sentencas: (Co,Mn)3O4, Co-Mn, and Al coatings were prepared on the FeCr-based ferritic-stainless-steel (SUS430).
Titulo: Chemical compatibility of Al2O3-added glass sealant with bare and coated interconnect in oxidizing and reducing environments

Sentencas: The (Co,Mn)3O4 coating exhibited water vapor bubble formation at the outer sealing edges when exposed to H2, indicating reactions between the coating and sealant.
Titulo: Chemical compatibility of Al2O3-added glass sealant with bare and coated interconnect in oxidizing and reducing environments

Sentencas: Co-Mn metal coating was found readily oxidized in an oxidizing environment.
Titulo: Chemical compatibility of Al2O3-added glass sealant with bare and coated interconnect in oxidizing and reducing environments

Sentencas: The glass with 5 wt% Al2O3 addition helped mitigate the Cr diffusion into sealant based on bare SUS430 substrate.
Titulo: Chemical compatibility of Al2O3-added glass sealant with bare and coated interconnect in oxidizing and reducing environments

Sentencas: Moreover, the Al metal layer effectively blocked the diffusion of Cr into the sealant at the interface and environment for 100 h, with a thickness of only 1 & mu;m.
Titulo: Chemical compatibility of Al2O3-added glass sealant with bare and coated interconnect in oxidizing and reducing environments

Sentencas: At the constant discharge current of 24 A, the voltage is stabilized at about 4.2 V for 48 h using H2 as fuel gas in 5-cell stack.
Titulo: Chemical compatibility of Al2O3-added glass sealant with bare and coated interconnect in oxidizing and reducing environments
